title: To power down the system, touch the ONOFF-DIM key.
caption_en: To power down the system, touch the ONOFF-DIM key.

title: The dimming control window will be displayed. Touch the OFF
caption_en: The dimming control window will be displayed. Touch the OFF

title: The system will now shut down when you touch the CONFIRM OFF
caption_en: The system will now shut down when you touch the CONFIRM OFF

title: The system is now turned off.
caption_en: The system is now turned off.
